channel.title: My server will not work no more,
channel.description:
my server has stopped working, its been upto 4days without working, i have updated my no-ip server name, and redownload utorrent + no-ip,
my port = 43594 and it only lets me on my server if i do 0.0.0.0 which is a localhost and ive used upto 3-4 source still doesent work,
could anyone please help,???

item.title: My server will not work no more,
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“umair, post:8, topic:245785”]Well, Can you log into your server or do other people have a problem loging in it?

if it’s others please make sure you have your Firewall turned off.[/quote]

well its only me that can get in with 0.0.0.0 which is a localhost and no, no1 cant get on it, says error connection to server and i think ive allways had my fire wall on, how can i turn it off dude =]?

Read full topic
item.source: My server will not work no more,

item.title: My server will not work no more,
item.dc:creator: @umair umair
item.description:
@umair wrote:

Well, Can you log into your server or do other people have a problem loging in it?

if it’s others please make sure you have your Firewall turned off.

Read full topic
item.source: My server will not work no more,

item.title: My server will not work no more,
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

Zev:

uuum, only thing I can think of is you need to port forward. Again.

wel im using utorrent and ive all[quote=“ziplock, post:4, topic:245785”][quote author=legend-scape link=topic=322255.msg2547326#msg2547326 date=1227360104]

you can login with the no-ip right?

well no becuz it only lets me on with 0.0.0.0 which is localhost,… :[
[/quote]

because you need to portforward. :)[/quote]

well im using utorrent and its allready portforward,…

Read full topic
item.source: My server will not work no more,

item.title: My server will not work no more,
item.dc:creator: @Spirit1 Spirit.
item.description:
@Spirit1 wrote:

Yes, you have to port foward please look at this tuorial made by Stormcutter http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285415.0.html It is very helpful when makeing a new Private server.

Read full topic

[/quote]

well no becuz it only lets me on with 0.0.0.0 which is localhost,… :[[/quote]
